verses.verse: וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> came בָּעֵ֣ת <WH6256> And it came to pass at that time הַהִ֔וא <WH1931> he וַיֵּ֥רֶד <WH3381> went down יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> that Judah מֵאֵ֣ת <WH853> אֶחָ֑יו <WH251> from his brethren וַיֵּ֛ט <WH5186> and turned עַד־ <WH5704> against אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> in to a certain עֲדֻלָּמִ֖י <WH5726> Adullamite וּשְׁמ֥וֹ <WH8034> whose name חִירָֽה׃ <WH2437> [was] Hirah

וַיַּרְא־ <WH7200> saw שָׁ֧ם <WH8033> there יְהוּדָ֛ה <WH3063> And Judah בַּת־ <WH1323> there a daughter אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> of a certain כְּנַעֲנִ֖י <WH3669> Canaanite וּשְׁמ֣וֹ <WH8034> whose name שׁ֑וּעַ <WH7770> [was] Shuah וַיִּקָּחֶ֖הָ <WH3947> and he took her וַיָּבֹ֥א <WH935> and went in אֵלֶֽיהָ׃ <WH413> about
וַתַּ֖הַר <WH2029> And she conceived וַתֵּ֣לֶד <WH3205> and bare בֵּ֑ן <WH1121> a son וַיִּקְרָ֥א <WH7121> and he called אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> his name עֵֽר׃ <WH6147> Er

וַתַּ֥הַר <WH2029> And she conceived ע֖וֹד <WH5750> again וַתֵּ֣לֶד <WH3205> again and bare בֵּ֑ן <WH1121> a son וַתִּקְרָ֥א <WH7121> and she called אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> his name אוֹנָֽן׃ <WH209> Onan

וַתֹּ֤סֶף <WH3254> And she yet again conceived עוֹד֙ <WH5750> still וַתֵּ֣לֶד <WH3205> and bare בֵּ֔ן <WH1121> a son וַתִּקְרָ֥א <WH7121> and called אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> his name שֵׁלָ֑ה <WH7956> Shelah וְהָיָ֥ה <WH1961> become בִכְזִ֖יב <WH3580> and he was at Chezib בְּלִדְתָּ֥הּ <WH3205> when she bare אֹתֽוֹ׃ <WH853>
וַיִּקַּ֧ח <WH3947> took יְהוּדָ֛ה <WH3063> And Judah אִשָּׁ֖ה <WH802> a wife לְעֵ֣ר <WH6147> for Er בְּכוֹר֑וֹ <WH1060> his firstborn וּשְׁמָ֖הּ <WH8034> whose name תָּמָֽר׃ <WH8559> [was] Tamar

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> become עֵ֚ר <WH6147> And Er בְּכ֣וֹר <WH1060> firstborn יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> Judah's רַ֖ע <WH7451> was wicked בְּעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> in the sight יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַיְמִתֵ֖הוּ <WH4191> slew יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> and the LORD

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> And Judah לְאוֹנָ֔ן <WH209> unto Onan בֹּ֛א <WH935> Go in אֶל־ <WH413> about אֵ֥שֶׁת <WH802> wife אָחִ֖יךָ <WH251> unto thy brother's וְיַבֵּ֣ם <WH2992> and marry אֹתָ֑הּ <WH853> וְהָקֵ֥ם <WH6965> her and raise up זֶ֖רַע <WH2233> seed לְאָחִֽיךָ׃ <WH251> to thy brother

וַיֵּ֣דַע <WH3045> knew אוֹנָ֔ן <WH209> And Onan כִּ֛י <WH3588> for לֹּ֥א <WH3808> not ל֖וֹ יִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> become הַזָּ֑רַע <WH2233> that the seed וְהָיָ֞ה <WH1961> not be his so אִם־ <WH518> should not be his and it came to pass when בָּ֨א <WH935> he went in אֶל־ <WH413> about אֵ֤שֶׁת <WH802> wife אָחִיו֙ <WH251> unto his brother's וְשִׁחֵ֣ת <WH7843> that he spilled אַ֔רְצָה <WH776> [it] on the ground לְבִלְתִּ֥י <WH1115> lest נְתָן־ <WH5414> that he should give זֶ֖רַע <WH2233> seed לְאָחִֽיו׃ <WH251> to his brother

וַיֵּ֛רַע <WH7489> was displeasing בְּעֵינֵ֥י <WH5869> the sight יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> And the thing which עָשָׂ֑ה <WH6213> he did וַיָּ֖מֶת <WH4191> wherefore he slew גַּם־ <WH1571> also אֹתֽוֹ׃ <WH853>

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> Then said יְהוּדָה֩ <WH3063> Judah לְתָמָ֨ר <WH8559> to Tamar כַּלָּת֜וֹ <WH3618> his daughter in law שְׁבִ֧י <WH3427> Remain אַלְמָנָ֣ה <WH490> a widow בֵית־ <WH1004> house אָבִ֗יךְ <WH1> at thy father's עַד־ <WH5704> until יִגְדַּל֙ <WH1431> be grown שֵׁלָ֣ה <WH7956> till Shelah בְנִ֔י <WH1121> my son כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אָמַ֔ר <WH559> for he said פֶּן־ <WH6435> lest יָמ֥וּת <WH4191> Lest peradventure he die גַּם־ <WH1571> too ה֖וּא <WH1931> he כְּאֶחָ֑יו <WH251> also as his brethren וַתֵּ֣לֶךְ <WH1980> went תָּמָ֔ר <WH8559> [did] And Tamar וַתֵּ֖שֶׁב <WH3427> and dwelt בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> house אָבִֽיהָ׃ <WH1> in her father's

וַיִּרְבּוּ֙ <WH7235> And in process הַיָּמִ֔ים <WH3117> of time וַתָּ֖מָת <WH4191> died בַּת־ <WH1323> the daughter שׁ֣וּעַ <WH7770> of Shuah אֵֽשֶׁת־ <WH802> wife יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> Judah's וַיִּנָּ֣חֶם <WH5162> was comforted יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> and Judah וַיַּ֜עַל <WH5927> and went up עַל־ <WH5921> and גֹּֽזֲזֵ֤י <WH1494> cut off צֹאנוֹ֙ <WH6629> cattle ה֗וּא <WH1931> he וְחִירָ֛ה <WH2437> Hirah רֵעֵ֥הוּ <WH7453> he and his friend הָעֲדֻלָּמִ֖י <WH5726> the Adullamite תִּמְנָֽתָה׃ <WH8553> to Timnath

וַיֻּגַּ֥ד <WH5046> And it was told לְתָמָ֖ר <WH8559> Tamar לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying הִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> Behold חָמִ֛יךְ <WH2524> Behold thy father in law עֹלֶ֥ה <WH5927> goeth up תִמְנָ֖תָה <WH8553> to Timnath לָגֹ֥ז <WH1494> to shear צֹאנֽוֹ׃ <WH6629> his sheep

וַתָּסַר֩ <WH5493> off בִּגְדֵ֨י <WH899> garments אַלְמְנוּתָ֜הּ <WH491> her widow's מֵֽעָלֶ֗יהָ <WH5921> and וַתְּכַ֤ס <WH3680> from her and covered her בַּצָּעִיף֙ <WH6809> with a vail וַתִּתְעַלָּ֔ף <WH5968> and wrapped herself וַתֵּ֙שֶׁב֙ <WH3427> and sat in בְּפֶ֣תַח <WH6607> place עֵינַ֔יִם <WH5869> an open אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which עַל־ <WH5921> is on דֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> which [is] by the way תִּמְנָ֑תָה <WH8553> to Timnath כִּ֤י <WH3588> for רָאֲתָה֙ <WH7200> for she saw כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for גָדַ֣ל <WH1431> was grown שֵׁלָ֔ה <WH7956> that Shelah וְהִ֕וא <WH1931> he לֹֽא־ <WH3808> had not נִתְּנָ֥ה <WH5414> and she was not given ל֖וֹ לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <WH802> unto him to wife

וַיִּרְאֶ֣הָ <WH7200> saw her יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> When Judah וַֽיַּחְשְׁבֶ֖הָ <WH2803> he thought לְזוֹנָ֑ה <WH2181> her [to be] an harlot כִּ֥י <WH3588> for כִסְּתָ֖ה <WH3680> because she had covered פָּנֶֽיהָ׃ <WH6440> her face

וַיֵּ֨ט <WH5186> And he turned אֵלֶ֜יהָ <WH413> about אֶל־ <WH413> to her הַדֶּ֗רֶךְ <WH1870> unto her by the way וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> and said הָֽבָה־ <WH3051> Go to נָּא֙ <WH4994> now אָב֣וֹא <WH935> I pray thee let me come in אֵלַ֔יִךְ <WH413> about כִּ֚י <WH3588> for לֹ֣א <WH3808> did not יָדַ֔ע <WH3045> unto thee (for he knew כִּ֥י <WH3588> for כַלָּת֖וֹ <WH3618> was his daughter-in-law הִ֑וא <WH1931> and she וַתֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> said מַה־ <WH4100> What תִּתֶּן־ <WH5414> What wilt thou give לִּ֔י כִּ֥י <WH3588> that תָב֖וֹא <WH935> me that thou mayest come in אֵלָֽי׃ <WH413> about

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> And he said אָנֹכִ֛י <WH595> I אֲשַׁלַּ֥ח <WH7971> I will send גְּדִֽי־ <WH1423> kid עִזִּ֖ים <WH5795> goat מִן־ <WH4480> from הַצֹּ֑אן <WH6629> from the flock וַתֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> And she said אִם־ <WH518> lo תִּתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> Wilt thou give עֵרָב֖וֹן <WH6162> [me] a pledge עַ֥ד <WH5704> until שָׁלְחֶֽךָ׃ <WH7971> till thou send

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> And he said מָ֣ה <WH4100> What הָֽעֵרָבוֹן֮ <WH6162> pledge אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> What אֶתֶּן־ <WH5414> shall I give לָּךְ֒ וַתֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> thee? And she said חֹתָֽמְךָ֙ <WH2368> Thy signet וּפְתִילֶ֔ךָ <WH6616> and thy bracelets וּמַטְּךָ֖ <WH4294> and thy staff אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> is in בְּיָדֶ֑ךָ <WH3027> that [is] in thine hand וַיִּתֶּן־ <WH5414> And he gave לָּ֛הּ וַיָּבֹ֥א <WH935> [it] her and came in אֵלֶ֖יהָ <WH413> to וַתַּ֥הַר <WH2029> unto her and she conceived לֽוֹ׃

וַתָּ֣קָם <WH6965> And she arose וַתֵּ֔לֶךְ <WH1980> and departed וַתָּ֥סַר <WH5493> and laid by צְעִיפָ֖הּ <WH6809> her vail מֵעָלֶ֑יהָ <WH5921> and וַתִּלְבַּ֖שׁ <WH3847> from her and put on בִּגְדֵ֥י <WH899> the garments אַלְמְנוּתָֽהּ׃ <WH491> of her widowhood

וַיִּשְׁלַ֨ח <WH7971> sent יְהוּדָ֜ה <WH3063> And Judah אֶת־ <WH853> גְּדִ֣י <WH1423> kid הָֽעִזִּ֗ים <WH5795> goat בְּיַד֙ <WH3027> by the hand רֵעֵ֣הוּ <WH7453> of his friend הָֽעֲדֻלָּמִ֔י <WH5726> the Adullamite לָקַ֥חַת <WH3947> to receive הָעֵרָב֖וֹן <WH6162> [his] pledge מִיַּ֣ד <WH3027> hand הָאִשָּׁ֑ה <WH802> from the woman's וְלֹ֖א <WH3808> did not מְצָאָֽהּ׃ <WH4672> but he found her

וַיִּשְׁאַ֞ל <WH7592> Then he asked אֶת־ <WH853> אַנְשֵׁ֤י <WH582> the men מְקֹמָהּ֙ <WH4725> of that place לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying אַיֵּ֧ה <WH346> Where הַקְּדֵשָׁ֛ה <WH6948> Where [is] the harlot הִ֥וא <WH1931> who בָעֵינַ֖יִם <WH5879> Enaim עַל־ <WH5921> was by הַדָּ֑רֶךְ <WH1870> the road וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <WH559> saying לֹא־ <WH3808> no הָיְתָ֥ה <WH1961> has been בָזֶ֖ה <WH2088> in this קְדֵשָֽׁה׃ <WH6948> There was no harlot

וַיָּ֙שָׁב֙ <WH7725> And he returned אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> to Judah וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> and said לֹ֣א <WH3808> I cannot מְצָאתִ֑יהָ <WH4672> find וְגַ֨ם <WH1571> her and furthermore אַנְשֵׁ֤י <WH376> the men הַמָּקוֹם֙ <WH4725> of the place אָֽמְר֔וּ <WH559> said לֹא־ <WH3808> no הָיְתָ֥ה <WH1961> has been בָזֶ֖ה <WH2088> no קְדֵשָֽׁה׃ <WH6948> [that] there was no harlot

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> And Judah תִּֽקַּֽח־ <WH3947> Let her take לָ֔הּ פֶּ֖ן <WH6435> otherwise נִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> will become לָב֑וּז <WH937> [it] to her lest we be shamed הִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> After שָׁלַ֙חְתִּי֙ <WH7971> behold I sent הַגְּדִ֣י <WH1423> this kid הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> this וְאַתָּ֖ה <WH859> you לֹ֥א <WH3808> did not מְצָאתָֽהּ׃ <WH4672> and thou hast not found

וַיְהִ֣י ׀ <WH1961> become כְּמִשְׁלֹ֣שׁ <WH7969> And it came to pass about three חֳדָשִׁ֗ים <WH2320> months וַיֻּגַּ֨ד <WH5046> after that it was told לִֽיהוּדָ֤ה <WH3063> Judah לֵֽאמֹר֙ <WH559> saying זָֽנְתָה֙ <WH2181> hath played the harlot תָּמָ֣ר <WH8559> Tamar כַּלָּתֶ֔ךָ <WH3618> thy daughter in law וְגַ֛ם <WH1571> is also הִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> and behold הָרָ֖ה <WH2030> and also behold she [is] with child לִזְנוּנִ֑ים <WH2183> by whoredom וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> And Judah הוֹצִיא֖וּהָ <WH3318> Bring her forth וְתִשָּׂרֵֽף׃ <WH8313> and let her be burnt

הִ֣וא <WH1931> he מוּצֵ֗את <WH3318> When she [was] brought forth וְהִ֨יא <WH1931> she שָׁלְחָ֤ה <WH7971> she sent אֶל־ <WH413> to her חָמִ֙יהָ֙ <WH2524> to her father in law לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying לְאִישׁ֙ <WH582> another אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> to whom אֵ֣לֶּה <WH428> these לּ֔וֹ אָנֹכִ֖י <WH595> I הָרָ֑ה <WH2030> whose these [are am] I with child וַתֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> and she said הַכֶּר־ <WH5234> Discern נָ֔א <WH4994> Please לְמִ֞י <WH4310> whose הַחֹתֶ֧מֶת <WH2858> I pray thee whose [are] these the signet וְהַפְּתִילִ֛ים <WH6616> and bracelets וְהַמַּטֶּ֖ה <WH4294> and staff הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <WH428> things

וַיַּכֵּ֣ר <WH5234> acknowledged יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> And Judah וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> [them] and said צָֽדְקָ֣ה <WH6663> She hath been more righteous מִמֶּ֔נִּי <WH4480> is more כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֥ן <WH3651> after that לֹא־ <WH3808> did not נְתַתִּ֖יהָ <WH5414> than I because that I gave לְשֵׁלָ֣ה <WH7956> her not to Shelah בְנִ֑י <WH1121> my son וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יָסַ֥ף <WH3254> again ע֖וֹד <WH5750> again לְדַעְתָּֽה׃ <WH3045> And he knew her

וַיְהִ֖י <WH1961> came בְּעֵ֣ת <WH6256> And it came to pass in the time לִדְתָּ֑הּ <WH3205> of her travail וְהִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> behold תְאוֹמִ֖ים <WH8380> that behold twins בְּבִטְנָֽהּ׃ <WH990> [were] in her womb

וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> took בְלִדְתָּ֖הּ <WH3205> And it came to pass when she travailed וַיִּתֶּן־ <WH5414> that [the one] put out יָ֑ד <WH3027> [his] hand וַתִּקַּ֣ח <WH3947> took הַמְיַלֶּ֗דֶת <WH3205> and the midwife וַתִּקְשֹׁ֨ר <WH7194> and bound עַל־ <WH5921> on יָד֤וֹ <WH3027> upon his hand שָׁנִי֙ <WH8144> a scarlet thread לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying זֶ֖ה <WH2088> This יָצָ֥א <WH3318> This came out רִאשֹׁנָֽה׃ <WH7223> first
